website_summaries.verdict: It may not be the most compact portable speaker on the block, but the Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere offers useful extras and great sound for an affordable price.
pros: The Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere offers an understated, travel-friendly design that's compatible with both iPods and other MP3 players (via auxiliary line-in).
and comes with a travel case and an innovative wall charger.
The included remote lets you navigate the iPod's menus
cons: The remote's range isn't very good, and the Pure-Fi Anywhere isn't as compact as many portable speaker options

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Pure-Fi: A Pure Winner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker system for use with iPods or other mp3 players ( I use it with an iPod Classic 120 gig ). It's best feature by far is the 10 hour rechargeable battery that make this unit totally portable. They sound great and the battery life is wonderful! Recently took it on a trip to the coast where we had a great little cabin rented. With this unit I was able to have music by the hot tub, front deck where there was a great view of the ocean, in the loft, bedroom, kitchen .. You name it! Anywhere I wanted access to my entire library I had it! It was great!! Totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Neuro

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are exactly what I was looking for. They are quite compact -- perfect for people with limited counterspace. You can easily carry them from room to room if needed. The remote is small enough to fit in your pocket or leave on the windowsill. The sound quality is good for such small speakers. Obviously not as good as Bose, but for the price very good. I didn't want to spend the money on Bose or the other high-end speakers. I am very pleased with these speakers, especially for the price. They even came with a carrying case so you can take them on vacation or camping or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit as a gift for a friend. I thought the sound was great for the size and price so I bought the "bigger brother" in the Logitech lineup (the Logitech Pure-Fi Elite) for myself expecting greater things and I was very disappointed (except for the clock) when comparing the two. If I had to do it over I'd buy the 'Anywhere' for myself as well and I might just do that anyway. Great sound for the money (limited bass of course) and worth a demo if you are considering an iPod dock, especially when a comparable competitor for this unit cost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe 49

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE SPEAKERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a million things before buying this product. It was a little more than what I wanted to spend but sooo worth the money. I never write reviews but I had to on this. It is INCREDIBLE!! The actual speakers charge tehmselves so you can unplug the speakers and take them outside even without a plug. They are sturdy unlike a lot of other cheap ones I have seen. I am so glad that I spent the money. If you are even considering a set of speakers - look noi further. I am a very picky person - even more so when it comes to my music. They are amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ashcroft

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this speaker set. It has great sound, but not booming volume. I've packed it along on several motorcycle trips and at the end of the day my friends and I have sat around listing to the ipod. We even get a little kareokee going! It includes adapters for all ipods, a remote control that works well, a charger that lets you wrap the cord neatly and a nice zipper case that holds it all. The internal batteries hold a good charge, so you can listen to your music for several hours. And the Amazon price could not be matched anywhere. This is one of my favorite "toys".
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I split the cost of this for our mother's Christmas present. She loves it. I heard what it sounded like a week later, and it sounds great. The rechargeable batteries are a big plus for her, and the case keeps it protected during transport. The 4GB iPod Nano (2nd gen.) she has fits perfectly into the cradle. I can see her using it at school (she's a teacher), at the beach, outside while entertaining guests in her backyard, at barbecues, etc. For the price of it, I'd say it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Plug in at all times
customer_reviews.text: The item is fine but is not able to be used for more than a few minutes without plugging it into an outlet. Mine was fully charged when I brought it to the beach and sadly, it did not even make it through the first song on its battery. I contacted the seller to make her aware of this problem and she in turn tested a few to make sure it was not the particular one that I had purchased from her. It was the same result with every one of them. It works fine but forget bringing it on trips to the beach, pool,park, etc... which, in my opinion, is the main reason most people invest in these.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindenmayer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price, one drawback
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these on amazon for my dad and then saw the price at Sam's Wholesale. $76 at sam's! I bought another a couple days ago to be the more mobile version of our pure-fi elite, which is a powered system with no battery with MUCH better sound than the others I've listened to. Only con with this one is the buttons on the actual unit are VERY hard to press. Using the remote is much easier. Range is a little lacking (about 15 feet) but works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. They sound great, look great and function well. the only thing i don't like is that when the 3.5mm plug is in it the power stays on even when you turn it off it turns back on. i just unplug it every time. It says not to keep it plugged in to the wall all the time but i have for a long time and it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected...
customer_reviews.text: I have the first generation (I think the MM-50(white)) one of these and I loved it! I decided to upgrade to a supposedly better one. After listening to this new one, I am really not happy. It doesnt even sound better than my old, cheaper one. The only plus is that the remote has more funtions on it and the charger packs away with the unit. I highly recommend going for the older one which is half price, unless you really need the color black.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Logitech portable speakers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Logitech speakers--the first the mm50 I gave to a friend of mine in Central America after he admired them. I then discovered that they no longer made the mm50 model but had upgraded to the Pure-Fi series. The main difference is that the new model has a neat storage area built into the speaker body to store the wall converter/charger. These speakers are great for the traveler who likes to play his own music in his room while traveling. A very reasonable price for a great sound experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Easton

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are very good for the price. The sound is quite nice though the volume is limited (controlled by the mp3 device) which is reasonable as the speakers are intended for a smaller room. The battery charge lasts quite a long time and the remote control is convenient. There are other speakers which also charge your mp3 device from the built-in rechargeable battery, but they are also in a higher price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, nice features, happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for my parents to use in Mexico. They don't have a stereo in their condo, and can't really listen to the radio anyhow, since the local music is not their favorite. They said they like the sound quality and they are very happy with this system and use it with their Ipod, and also they like that they can unplug it and take it on the patio in the afternoon and play music with no cords or cables.
customer_reviews.author: Side Stitch Magic

customer_reviews.title: LOgitech Pure-fi speakers
customer_reviews.text: Speakers work fine and sound pretty good. I don't use them with an ipod, I use them with my Sansa player, but I think they sound fine. The zippered case is a nice bonus as I took them to the beach house. If you decide to buy these speakers, as I did, for a player that's not an ipod, and not going to sit on the compatible cradle, don't forget to get a short input/output cord for it to just plug into it's audio-in port....
customer_reviews.author: S. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Needs lots of improvements
customer_reviews.text: Sound is OK for a device of this category. Music can get distorted if you turn the volume all the way up, especially if you are playing it on battery since it can't handle the needed power. You cannot use the audio in method on battery since it will constantly shut itself off after a few minutes thinking it's not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery life for that outdoor event on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and battery life for that outdoor event on the go. Built tough for travel. It also looks good if you want to use it indoors on a table, desk, or shelf. Easy to use and no need to read any directions its that simple. Used for iPod classic.
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Yes, after 8 years of a lot of use my old one broke but with Amazon I was able to find another one. I actually like the white one better, since I use it for massage and the black one showed oily fingerprints all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Amazing Price - Slight Shipping Error
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a portable iPod speaker, this one is darn good. I bought mine at $50 or so. Saw it at BestBuy on the self for $150. The charge lasts 4-6 hours. The speakers also play Pandora on my iPod touch flawlessly, granted the remote will not work with Pandora, which is expected. The company mistakenly sent me an older, refurbished speaker. Immediately after contacting the vendor, they apologized and sent the new speaker. In fact, they did not require a return the older speaker. I don't think you can go wrong with this speaker (on sale).
customer_reviews.author: rbH

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: My pre-teen daughter wanted a set of speakers for her ipod so I told her to do her research and we would get her a set within a reasonable price range. After she did her "homework" - she selected these speakers. For such small speakers this set really does have great sound. It comes with a great little case for storage and travel, too.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Pure-Fi. Now you can't compare this to a Bose $400 system. But the sound quality is good, especially for the price. It is portable has decent volume. I hook it up to my laptop to listen to Pandora or Slacker. The battery life is very good. Plugged in it will also charge your IPOD while playing it. The remote works well. Overall there is nothing I would change about my Pure-Fi. $100 well spent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality speakers for the price. It comes w/ all the ipod docks and comes in a nice case to store the speakers, the charger, and the remote. Small enough to fit into your carry on bag and luggage. These speakers will get stolen if you pack them into your check in luggage. It comes in both black and white. I would recommend the black one b/c it'll stay cleaner. Overall, i would recommend these speakers for anyone looking for something small that comes with it's own carrying case. Amazon sells it the cheapest. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Moon

customer_reviews.title: Logitech iPod speakers from Amazon are an Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, does exactly what it says it will do. great for travel--compact with carry case. sound is impressive for it's small size. friends we were staying with were impressed also and plan to purchase one too. found cheaper at [...] after buying online. Update: Five years later, still using this product without any problems. It has literally been around the world on boats and planes and cars and never failed to be a great source of entertainment inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for almost 4 years now and it still gives me 7-8 hours on a single charge. Excellent build quality. Logitech may build in Taiwan and China, but are inherently a Swiss company, so the quality and finish is evidently good.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Krishnankutty

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere Compact Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I use it with my Apple I-touch, and it works beautifully. It keeps the I-touch charged and the playback fidelity is very good. Very portable and with a very nice case and remote. Great item for the price when compared to the Bose products.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but poor battery lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for our Summer outdoor activities. I was very happy with the sound of the speakers and that it charges the iPod, however, very disappointed with the battery lifetime. I was described to last 10hours and I only got 6 hours (non stop, so it was very easy to count). That is my major concern. It's good that it has a remote and the surround button really gives the sound a boost. It cames in a really nice case that even has room for the ipod (at least nano) so it's nicely portable. The poor battery lifetime it's a really downside.
customer_reviews.author: Catia Proenca

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Portable Speakers
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought these to use with a Zune because it has an auxiliary input. It ended up not being very loud, so we borrowed a friend's ipod & they worked a lot better. When used with an ipod they are really good. This is a well thought out product; the carrying case is small and light, it has a built in battery, the remote controls the basic functions of the ipod and the plug has a cord keeper. I know most people in the world already have an ipod, but in order to get the full functionality out of this you really need one. 4 stars because it does not work well with non-ipods.
customer_reviews.author: M. Offord

customer_reviews.title: Great for On The Go
customer_reviews.text: This speaker system is great for someone who wants to take their speaker system on the go. It is perfect for vacations (hotel and pool). The rechargable battery also makes it convenient. With the $[...] rebate and free prime shipping it was a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: C. Corman

customer_reviews.title: Pure Shi-
customer_reviews.text: Worked until the warranty expired then it shuts off after few minutes even when using electricity i use it now to charge my i pod and keep it around to remind me never to buy a Logitech device again
customer_reviews.author: geo wash

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the value... and great sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are what they're made to do, play music from an iPod with a good fidelity and moderate sound level (according to it size). I use it in my hotel room and it sounds great, it fills all the room with the half of the volume level set. Obviously it will not fill a large room even at high volume. I highly recommend... are very nice speakers at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ignacio Nale

customer_reviews.title: Compact Speakers for Ipod
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these new speakers that I recently purchased very much. Construction is superb, sound quality very good, and the battery life we most appreciate. Logitech has always produced excellent products so the quality in this product was not a surprise to me.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for a long time before I ordered these speakers, and I have no doubt that they are the best value for the money available. The sound is amazing for such a small unit, the carrying case is sturdy and well-designed, and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ford

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is cool. It comes with a carrying case. You can charge it up with the provided cable, and go for hours without an external power source. It also charges your ipod! It even has a little remote control! Sound is really nice. It's not Bose, but it's sounds good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Happy AMZ customer

customer_reviews.title: Not New
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a New White New Logitech Pure-Fi. When I received it, the white logitech speakers were in a box for a black logitech speaker dock box meaning the box was open and not new. I then looked over the unit and it is def not new. It is in good condition but not brand new. I am very upset that this company is charging more than it should cost and lying about what they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Size, Function
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Pure-Fi Anywhere for a year and a half and I love the sounds quality and the battery life. The range is excellent, producing crisp lows, clean mids, and clear highs. The remote functionality is great and totally unexpected. It navigates through your iPod with ease and simplicity. I just bought 2 of these for gifts this Christmas and I am sure they will be as pleased as I have been.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Ipod Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased refurbished Logitech speakers for my iPod nano. The speakers work great and even include a remote control and battery backup! I highly recommend this product & company I purchase the speakers from.
customer_reviews.author: PNSY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this MP3 stereo to have a device I could use inside the house to listen to my iPod. It was the greatest purchase! It is light and compact; I easily take it from the bedroom to the kitchen. It was a great buy. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Roye

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BUY
customer_reviews.text: There is no way that you can tell that the item is refurbished. It works like new. I had an issue with the product and the seller was extremely cooperative in resolving it. I have nothing but nice things to say about both the product and the company who sold it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these speakers to replace ones I had from a few years ago and the sound on these is clearly more robust. They have better volume too. I use them outside and they are sufficient without loosing the sound to the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for speakers for my wife to use with her classic iPod, so that she could listen to music while she worked, without using headphones. This dock system is perfect. The item arrived when it was scheduled to arrive and the performance is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: dave bowen

customer_reviews.title: Good overall. Works with iPhone. Lacks volume.
customer_reviews.text: Volume could be stronger although sound quality does not distort all the way up to max volume. Sound expand button makes many songs echo. Sounds like they are being played in a tunnel. Remote works well with iPhone's menu. Remote range is over 25 ft. Case everything including power cord and remote. Great deal for 70 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Wettersten

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This has very clear sound and has lasted over 5 years of constant play and travel. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Ipod player. It is loud and clear perfect for camping for us.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: remote sucks
customer_reviews.text: The main unit works ok, but the remote is a joke. It kills a battery in less then a week. Sound quality is pretty good and i like that it charges my ipod as it plays.
customer_reviews.author: cpat78

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speakers
customer_reviews.text: I purchases two of these for my daughters. They love them. They like to take them outside and listen to music while they play. And they sound good too.
customer_reviews.author: Super fly chic

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't like classical music
customer_reviews.text: The sound is OK and the unit works well enough, except for one quirk. When playing soft passages of classical music, the speakers and iPod turn themselves off! This problem doesn't occur when using headphones or my other speaker system. (I also have the Bose system, but that unit is too big and too fragile for routine travel.) The problem also doesn't occur with other types of music. I guess it just gets bored with my music selections.
customer_reviews.author: PCP

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for Little Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time searching for the perfect portable ipod speakers. It came down to a decision between the Logitech Pure Fi Anywhere and the Altec Lansing inMotion. I went to a store to check both out and chose this one due to the fact that the Altec Lansing seemed cheap in comparison (plastic, not nearly as much weight to it, ugly design). I am very happy with my purchase and have used my speakers both indoors and out to produce great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speakers for your iPod touch.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great. Well made and very portable with a nice case. For the price you get excellent speakers and portability. We think this is a very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good portable room speakers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for small speakers that I could take from room to room in my house. These work great. Good sound and portability make these speakers a great buy if that's what you're looking for. I bought them from a 3rd party, Tech For Less. They provided phenomenal customer service (the first set of speakers I bought had a faulty battery indicator and they got me a different set super quickly).
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound but never received rebate
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the sound from this player. I purchased this item the last round of rebates and I have yet to receive. It has been almost 3 months, I have not had any responses after emailing logitech customer service. After hearing about the battery problems with this product I was willing to pay the $ with the rebate calculated in. Not so sure if I would have bought it at full price $69.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers, you wont regret buying them
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best sounding little speakers you've ever heard. It really is amazing that I got such a bargain on them (open box), they came in new condition and I love em. Probably THE best ipod accesory you can get, especially considering the price, about 35 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: German Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This item was very short lived. Used it for a week then anytime I plugged it, it would release smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: I bought it...
customer_reviews.text: I owned the previous model of these speakers. This is definitely an improvement. First off the case holds the charger now( which makes a lot of sense for traveling speakers). Long battery life, and decent sound for the size of the speakers. The remote control still has a few quirks here and there but it is much better than the previous remote control. I like it. =]
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: low volume inferior sound
customer_reviews.text: I have the pure fi elite, which is a far superior product. this thing is a small baby boom box , def not worth money.
customer_reviews.author: djnate2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for my yoga classes, so it gets heavy use. Never a problem, great volume and reliability. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bunten

customer_reviews.title: Definitely met my expectaitions
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. The size is good (a little heavy). I love the travel case. I researched for about 3 hours and finally chose this one. Very glad I did. No disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clemmensen

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Pure-fi is amazing. For how compact this little system is it puts out amazing sound. Charges your ipod, remote works from 18 feet for me. You can put this thing anywhere if you remove the wired power adapter. Plays for 10-15 hours minimum when charged. A great buy! Ive heard bose and I like this one better, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: zhut

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work properly with iPod Touch
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have a lovely sound quality, and they go decently loud too - but they have a documented problem when using the remote control with an iPod Touch - the remote skips menu items, ie pressing the up/down button always moves 2 places in the menu, with the effect that you can only select half your tracks/artists/playlists using the remote.
customer_reviews.author: opanto39

customer_reviews.title: great speaker
customer_reviews.text: great system,especially with the 10 hr battery and the hard case.this my 4th purchase.i would recommend this item to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers to provide music on my deck, although the unit would be easy to carry for travel. I was pleasantly surprized at the sound. Price was much lower than the big-box stores. Have really enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great and they are just like new. It took awhile to get to me but I did opt for the free shipping. I would buy from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Lousy Battery...
customer_reviews.text: Battery won,t hold a charge. Its a shame because the unit sounds great and is very portable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a good price. Gift for my wife and she loves it. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers give excellent sound. I would buy this product again. If you are looking for a portable ipod speaker, buy these the sound is true and solid. One draw back is the sound won't fill a large room, but we use it a smaller room and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: avg guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Speaker System
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, nice portable size and solid construction. I previously purchased the comparable Altec Lansing IM600 which probably had a little better sound, but could not withstand my son's rough use. The Logitech unit is more solid.
customer_reviews.author: spalaw

customer_reviews.title: Logitech 984 ipod speakers
customer_reviews.text: Product was very good and we liked the portability. However, it didnot come with the adopter for my ipod nano 3rd generation. It came with about 10 other adapters but #13 that I needed was not there. I had to buy that somewhere else. That was bad part.
customer_reviews.author: Kedar N. Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: The speakers were perfect for listening to downloaded audiobooks during our camping trips! Sound was clear, and the remote was greatly appreciated on nights without the moonlight! Definitely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner4life

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a black one, as advertised, although I would have preferred a white one, but was extremely surprised when a white one arrived... I am sooooo very happy
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Not the loudest thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: It is very portable and the remote is handy. It is not very loud though if you need it to be. Not good on picnics but great for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. Perfect for all outdoor activities. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: NANA D.

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Speakers for IPod rawk!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Opened the box, had it working within minutes from getting the package. Great sound, easy to use. A couple of the older IPods, that my wife wrote off for dead, came to life upon being plugged in. So good vibes all around!
customer_reviews.author: Boris Kitsis

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for the money. Love the sound. Well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Renard

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old daughter for Christmas and she said "Its Awesome"! Sounds great........however the battery doesn't last as long as they say it will, she gets about 5 hours out of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Logitech IPod Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: Love it... Just about everyone I bring it around says "I need to get one of those!" I bought it for listening to my IPod while in my boat fishing. I have had it out playing long periods of time without the battery ever going down all the way.
customer_reviews.author: anthdale

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but not exactly portable
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I chose this device is because it can (allegedly) hold a charge and play music anywhere, even when not plugged in. In actuality, straight out of the box it refused to hold a charge and doesn't play if it's not plugged in. It's pretty slick and cute, and I would be 100% happy with it if it actually did what it says it does, but since it doesn't, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Elbel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although the speakers sounded awesome, the remote did not work at all. When I opened the remote control, the battery looked a bit old and a bit rusty. I spent a lot of time researching portable speakers and these were highly recommended, but I was disappointed with the non-functioning remote. I wound up returning these for a refund. I must say, though, the speakers sounded great!

customer_reviews.title: Very low volume
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size and the travel case, but unless you are sitting directly in front of it, it is hard to hear. I have compensated all of my iPod music for maximum volume, but still have to turn the volume all the way up on the logitech to hear comfortably. Also, it is annoying that the unit seems to turn off about every 5 minutes when running on batteries.

I called them and they told me to uncharge it and let it charge again. I did that and it did not help. I have never called Logitech back. Time for me to see what they will do which is basically nothing... Mark

customer_reviews.title: Won't play a song past 1 minute
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great reviews and bought this unit. Unfortunately, we did not open it up and actually use it until last week--so we are now beyond the 30 day return policy. We have tried everything, but after you turn it on, it plays the first song for one minute and then goes dead. Seems this happens with these, and logitech never responds. We've tried resetting the Ipod, recharging all of the batteries, etc. No luck.

product_meta.title: Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere Compact Speakers for iPod (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Pure-Fi Anywhere speaker system uses a unique combination of speaker drivers to deliver clear sound with maximum bass and minimal distortion. Its compact size and long battery life make it the ideal companion to your iPod.

AMAZON.COM
 The Pure-Fi Anywhere speaker system uses a unique combination of speaker drivers to deliver clear sound with maximum bass and minimal distortion. Its compact size and long battery life make it the ideal companion to your iPod. Plus, the system comes with a 2-year limited hardware warranty.

 



The Pure-Fi Anywhere's slim design makes it easy to use it, well, anywhere. 

Your iPod connects easily via the iPod dock. View larger. 

Sleek design meets powerful audio performance. View larger. Performance
Thanks to the Pure-Fi Anywhere's advanced acoustics, you'll experience exceptionally clear sound with maximum bass. A set of 2-inch Max-X active, high-excursion drivers delivers full, balanced audio, while 3-inch pressure drivers maximize the bass response. StereoXL technology widens the stereo image dramatically, creating an immersive audio experience. Convenience
Enjoy your music longer with a 10-hour rechargeable battery and a battery-level indicator, which eliminates surprises. An included travel case protects and stores the speakers, remote, and streamlined AC adapter. The Pure-Fi Anywhere also charges your iPod and it supports all iPod models with dock connectors--including iPod nano and iPod with video. The system also supports the 1G and 3G iPod models, and other portable music players, via the 3.5-millimeter auxiliary input.

 Control
Use the included wireless remote to control your iPod and browse your content from anywhere in the room. One-touch controls on the remote allow you to enjoy instant access to shuffle and repeat functions.

 
What's in the Box
Logitech Pure-Fi Anywhere speaker system, international voltage (100–240V) AC adapter, advanced wireless remote, protective travel case, and installation guide.
